func_sig.description: Solve for the angles of a triangle given its side lengths using the Law of Cosines.
func_sig.name: solve_triangle_angles

func_sig.description: Compute the projection of vector v onto vector w using the dot product.
func_sig.name: compute_vector_projection

func_sig.description: Evaluate arithmetic or mathematical expressions provided as strings and return the result as a simplified expression.
func_sig.name: evaluate_math_expression

expression.description: The mathematical expression or equation to evaluate.

func_sig.description: Convert a point from rectangular coordinates to spherical coordinates (rho, theta, phi) where rho > 0, 0 <= theta < 2*pi, and 0 <= phi <= pi.
func_sig.name: convert_coordinates_to_spherical

func_sig.description: Finds the equation of a plane given three points in 3D space. The result is simplified to integers where applicable, ensuring greatest common divisor of coefficients is 1.
func_sig.name: find_plane_equation_from_points

func_sig.description: Calculate the tangent of the difference of two angles using the tangent subtraction formula.
func_sig.name: solve_tangent_difference

func_sig.description: Solves a variety of mathematical problems by formulating equations, systems of equations, and numeric computations using SymPy. Includes enhancements for better parsing, evaluation, and handling of specific symbolic expressions and numeric calculations. Now with improved parsing for exceptions and refined input recognition for equations and geometric problems.
func_sig.name: solve_question_with_sympy

problem_description.description: The problem to solve, described in natural language.

variables.description: Variables involved in the problem statement, used for symbolic evaluation.

func_sig.description: Calculate the tangent of the difference between two angles given their tangents.
func_sig.name: evaluate_tangent_difference
